ol.li: Sync product starts fetching product data from Shopify store and will just add that data in Product Queue for processing. (Shopify > Processes > Queues Logs > Products)
A Scheduled/Cron Job, running in background will start processing Queues one by one.
It will fetch the products for the specified range of Create/Update Date in 'From Date' and 'To Date' fields below.
The default value for 'From Date' will be the last execution date of this operation. It will be blank if the last execution date is not found.
The default value for 'To Date' will be current date and time.
You can find the details of last execution of this operation in Menu Shopify > Configuration > Settings > Select an instance.

For more details please check
User Guide
Sync product starts fetching product data from Shopify store based on defined shopify product template ids and will just add that data in Product Queue and also process it.
Please define shopify product template ids with comma separated values without any write quotes.
Please not use any special symbols Like: ~,!,@,#,$,%,^,*,?,/,\,;,.,=,+,-,
Example of define shopify product template ids: 4341100314679,4341100314680,4341100314678,4341100314658

For more details please check
User Guide
It will start fetching Order data from Shopify store and will just add that data in Order Queue for processing. (Shopify > Processes > Queues Logs > Unshipped Orders)
It will fetch the orders for the dates specified in 'From Date' and 'To Date' fields below.
The default value for 'From Date' will be the last execution date of this operation. It will be blank if the last execution date is not found.
The default value for 'To Date' will be current date and time.
Connector only imports those orders which have created after a given date(Shopify > Configuration > Settings > Last Date Of Import Process) in the configuration.

Import customers starts fetching customers data from Shopify store and will just add that data in Customer Queue for processing. (Shopify > Processes > Queues Logs > Customers)
A Scheduled/Cron Job, running in background will start processing Queues one by one.
It fetches only those Customers which are updated after the last execution date of this operation.
If last execution date is not found, it will fetch all the customers.
You can find the details of last execution of this operation under a particular instance.
Export stock allows to export product stock to Shopify store for configured Shopify Locations, for a given instance
Stock will be exported from warehouses as per the configuration under Shopify > Configuration > Shopify Locations > Export Stock section.
It will export stock of only those products which are already synchronized with Shopify.
It will try to export stock of those products whose stock is updated since last execution of this operation.
If last execution details are not available, it will consider those products whose stock is updated since last 30 days.

For more details please check
User Guide
Import stock allows to import product stock from Shopify store to Odoo.
Stock will be imported to warehouse as per the configuration under Shopify > Configuration > Shopify Locations > Import Stock section.
This operation will generate Inventory Adjustment record under Inventory > Operations > Inventory Adjustments.

Stock will be applied automatically by enable Auto apply inventory adjustment configuration, Otherwise you need to process inventory adjustment transaction record manually to bring stock changes effect.
The Update Order Shipping Status allows you to update order fulfillment and tracking reference details to Shopify store.
An order's status gets updated only once to Shopify store.

For more details please check
User Guide
Import payout report allows to import payout transaction report from Shopify store to Odoo.
Payout Report record will be added under Shopify > Sales > Invoices & Payout > Payout Reports.

For more details please check
User Guide
This operation allows to import Odoo Products to Shopify layer.

You can export the products into csv from Sales > Products > Products. Select Multiple Products or Open a product and click on the 'Shopify - Export Products' action from Action menu. Select Export Method > Export in CSV file.

You can export the products into xlsx from Sales > Products > Products. Select Multiple Products or Open a product and click on the 'Shopify - Export Products' action from Action menu. Select Export Method > Export in XLSX file.
Import location allows to import shopify location from Shopify store to Odoo.
It will fetch the active/deactivate locations.
This operation will create location record under Shopify > Configuration > Shopify Locations.

For more details please check
User Guide
This process will export selected Product(s) Stock from Odoo to Shopify store, as per the configuration of shopify location and stock field under Shopify instance configurations.
If multiple products are selected, a maximum of 80 products can be processed at a time.
